name: Robot
description:
This is a role-playing adventure puzzle game, a wonderful and unfamiliar world that requires thinking in order to continue moving forward, exploring the wonders of this game, overcoming various difficulties, and experiencing magical experiences.

This game has a good casual gameplay, and we will command the robot to have a tense and exciting experience of crossing levels.

The horizontal version of this game allows players to experience shock in the game. There are many wonderful journeys waiting for us, and we can command a robot without emotions in the game. The commands left for the robot are only to execute, and you only need to command the robot to pass through the level.

Game gameplay:

You need only the little robot to pass the level smoothly!

You first need to drag the bottom (direction key or prop key) to the top in the order you think! Then the robot will act according to your command (direction or prop)!
